label: attachedIOTDevice
comment: An IOT device attached to this logistics transport means.

rangeIncludes.comment: An IOT (Internet of Things) piece of mechanical or electronic equipment which can collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data.

domainIncludes.comment: A piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.,A referenced piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.
